entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening then 30 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 11 except 6 along the Strait. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 11 except 6 along the Strait. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
